name: GO THERE COLLECT BACK REPEAT
description:
Hello and welcome, I hope you enjoy playing "GO THERE COLLECT BACK REPEAT"

You can COLLECT little cube people who can collect resources to build things.
now get out THERE, COLLECT those resources and bring them BACK to the storage so we can build some things!

This was made in 7 days for the gamejam: VIMJAM.
Focus of the game had to be: COLLECTABLES
Theme: THERE AND BACK

Eventually I wanted to add unique features for them, combat, different resources and buildings but I had to scrap that, 7 days was a challenge (ofcourse).

Once the jam is over I will probably continue adding stuff as planned, in a separate project not part of the jam, to continue my original idea (bigger, more impossible to achieve in 7 days).
